title: Devils Postpile National Monument: Other Resources
body: Other Resources       There are many ways to get kids involved in National Parks. Below are several links that will help teachers and students learn about Devils Postpile and all of our parks and monuments. The National Park Service Teachers: Provides links to Web Rangers, Junior Ranger programs, curriculum ideas, and many other resources. The National Park Service Web Rangers: This is a great interactive way for students to learn about the National Park Service.   U.S. Geological Survey The USGS Long Valley Caldera: Provides links to the regional geologic story behind the Long Valley Caldera. The USGS Geology of Devils Postpile: Gives an in depth look at the geology of Devils Postpile and the Sierra Nevada. The USGS Education Resources for Teachers: This is a good base for curricular ideas, scientific data, and other resources dealing with geology, biology, hydrology, and geography.
